ingredients.ingredient: 1 head cauliflower, cut into bite-size pieces
½ cup coleslaw dressing (such as Kraft®)
½ cup ranch dressing (such as Kraft® Rancher's Choice)
1 (14.5 ounce) package nacho cheese-flavored tortilla chips (such as Doritos®), crushed

cookingTips: Cut cauliflower into bite-sized pieces so they mix well with dressing
Add crushed chips just before serving to maintain crispness
Mix the two dressings together or layer them for balanced flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: When would you add the crushed tortilla chips to prevent them from becoming soggy?
